Curator's comments: Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Nos. 1208-9 Originally one (?) demotic papyrus (now palimpsest, partly legible)". Cf. P BM EA 10209. Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. The Beatifications are published in J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien III Osirisliturgien in Papyri der Spaetzeit (Heidelberg 2008). Quack, J.F. 2022. Altägyptische Amulette und ihre Handhabung. Orientalische Religionen in der Antike 31. Tübingen, pp. 195, 311. Under study by Ann-Kathrin Gill (Oxford).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (139)
